**Example 1: CopyActivityChannel**



Input: 

```
tccli solar CopyActivityChannel --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --ActivityId act_abc123 \
    --ChannelFrom ch_aaa \
    --ChannelTo ch_ccc ch_bbb
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "08653cdb-55cb-45d0-a70f-33c834e30381"
    }
}
```
